verses.verse: And<WG1161> the apostles<WG652> and<WG2532> brothers<WG80> that<WG3588> were<WG5607> in<WG2596> Judæa<WG2449> heard<WG191> that<WG3754> the Nations<WG1484> had<WG1209> also<WG2532> received<WG1209> the word<WG3056> of God<WG2316>.
And<WG2532> when<WG3753> Peter<WG4074> had come up<WG305> to<WG1519> Jerusalem<WG2414>, they that were<WG3588> of<WG1537> the circumcision<WG4061> contended<WG1252> with<WG4314> him<WG846>,
Saying<WG3754>, You went in<WG1525> to<WG4314> men<WG435><WG99999> uncircumcised<WG203>, and<WG2532> did eat with<WG4906> them<WG846>.
But<WG1161> Peter<WG4074> rehearsed<WG756> the matter from the beginning<WG1620>, and expounded it by order<WG2517> unto them<WG846>, saying<WG3004>,

I<WG1473> was<WG2252> in<WG1722> the city<WG4172> of Joppa<WG2445> praying<WG4336>: and<WG2532> in<WG1722> a trance<WG1611> I saw<WG1492> a vision<WG3705>, A certain<WG5100> vessel<WG4632> descended<WG2597>, as it had been<WG5613> a great<WG3173> sheet<WG3607>, let down<WG2524> from<WG1537> heaven<WG3772> by four<WG5064> corners<WG746>; and<WG2532> it came<WG2064> even to<WG891> me<WG1700>:

Upon<WG1519> which<WG3739>, when I had fastened my eyes<WG816>, I considered<WG2657>, and<WG2532> saw<WG1492> fourfooted animals<WG5074> of the earth<WG1093>, and<WG2532> wild animals<WG2342>, and<WG2532> creeping things<WG2062>, and<WG2532> birds<WG4071> of the air<WG3772>.
And<WG1161> I heard<WG191> a voice<WG5456> saying<WG3004> unto me<WG3427>, Arise<WG450>, Peter<WG4074>; kill<WG2380> and<WG2532> eat<WG5315>.

But<WG1161> I said<WG2036>, Not so<WG3365>, Lord<WG2962>: for<WG3754> nothing<WG3956> common<WG2839> or<WG2228> unclean<WG169> has at any time<WG3763> entered<WG1525> into<WG1519> my<WG3450> mouth<WG4750>.

But<WG1161> the voice<WG5456> answered<WG611> me<WG3427> again<WG1208> from<WG1537> heaven<WG3772>, What<WG3739> God<WG2316> has cleansed<WG2511>, that call<WG2840> not<WG3361><WG99999> unclean<WG1537>.
And<WG1161> this<WG5124> was done<WG1096><WG99999> three times<WG5151>: and<WG2532> all<WG537> were drawn up<WG385> again<WG3825> into<WG1519> heaven<WG3772>.

And<WG2532>, behold<WG2400>, immediately<WG1824> there were three<WG5140> men<WG435> there<WG2186> at<WG1909> the house<WG3614><WG99999> where<WG3739> I was<WG1510>, sent<WG649> from<WG575> Cæsarea<WG2542> unto<WG4314> me<WG3165>.

And<WG1161> the Spirit<WG4151> told<WG2036> me<WG3427> go with<WG4905> them<WG846>, without<WG3367> discriminating<WG1252>. And<WG1161> these<WG3778> six<WG1803> brothers<WG80><WG99999> accompanied<WG2064><WG99999> me<WG1698>, and<WG2532> we entered<WG1525> into<WG1519> the man<WG435>'s house<WG3624>:

And<WG5037> he showed<WG518> us<WG2254> how<WG4459> he had seen<WG1492> an angel<WG32> in<WG1722> his<WG846> house<WG3624>, which stood<WG2476> and<WG2532> said<WG2036> unto him<WG846>, Send<WG649> men<WG435> to<WG1519> Joppa<WG2445>, and<WG2532> call for<WG3343> Simon<WG4613>, whose surname is<WG1941> Peter<WG4074>;
Who<WG3739> shall tell<WG2980><WG99999> you<WG4571> words<WG1722>, by which<WG3739> you<WG4771> and<WG2532> all<WG3956> your<WG4675> house<WG3624> shall be saved<WG4982>.

And<WG1161> as<WG1722> I<WG3165> began<WG756> to speak<WG2980>, the Holy<WG40> Spirit<WG4151> fell<WG1968> on<WG1909> them<WG846>, as<WG5618><WG99999> on<WG1909> us<WG2248> at<WG1722> the beginning<WG746>.

Then<WG1161> I<WG3415> remembered the word<WG4487> of the Lord<WG2962>, how that<WG5613> he said<WG3004>, John<WG2491> indeed<WG3303> baptized<WG907> with water<WG5204>; but<WG1161> you<WG5210> shall be baptized<WG907> with<WG1722> the Holy<WG40> Spirit<WG4151>.

Forasmuch<WG1487> then<WG3767> as<WG5613> God<WG2316> gave<WG1325> them<WG846> the same<WG2470> gift<WG1431> as<WG2532> he did us<WG2254>, who believed<WG4100> on<WG1909> the Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG1161>; who<WG5101> was<WG2252> I<WG1473>, that I could<WG1415> withstand<WG2967> God<WG2316>?

When<WG1161> they heard<WG191> these things<WG5023>, they held their peace<WG2270>, and<WG2532> glorified<WG1392> God<WG2316>, saying<WG3004>, Then<WG686> has<WG1325> God<WG2316> also<WG2532> to the Nations<WG1484> granted<WG1325> repentance<WG3341> unto<WG1519> life<WG2222>.

Now<WG3767> they<WG1289>, which were scattered abroad <WG3303> upon<WG575> the persecution<WG2347> that arose<WG1096> about<WG1909> Stephen<WG4736>, traveled<WG1330> as far as<WG2193> Phenice<WG5403>, and<WG2532> Cyprus<WG2954>, and<WG2532> Antioch<WG490>, preaching<WG2980> the word<WG3056> to none<WG3367> but<WG1508> the Jews<WG2453> only<WG3440>.

And<WG1161> some<WG5100> of<WG1537> them<WG846> were<WG2258> men<WG435> of Cyprus<WG2953> and<WG2532> Cyrene<WG2956>, who<WG3748>, when they were come<WG1525> to<WG1519> Antioch<WG490>, spoke<WG2980> to<WG4314> the Grecians<WG1675>, preaching<WG2097> the Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424>.
And<WG2532> the hand<WG5495> of the Lord<WG2962> was<WG2258> with<WG3326> them<WG846>: and<WG5037> a great<WG4183> number<WG706> believed<WG4100>, and turned<WG1994> to<WG1909> the Lord<WG2962>.

Then<WG1161> news<WG3056> of<WG4012> these things<WG846> came<WG191> to<WG1519> the ears<WG3775> of the church<WG1577> which was<WG3588> in<WG1722> Jerusalem<WG2414>: and<WG2532> they sent forth<WG1821> Barnabas<WG921>, that he should go<WG1330> as far as<WG2193> Antioch<WG490>.

Who<WG3739>, when he came<WG3854>, and<WG2532> had seen<WG1492> the grace<WG5485> of God<WG2316>, was glad<WG5463>, and<WG2532> exhorted<WG3870> them all<WG3956>, that with purpose<WG4286> of heart<WG2588> they would cleave<WG4357> to the Lord<WG2962>.

For<WG3754> he was<WG2258> a good<WG18> man<WG435>, and<WG2532> full<WG4134> of the Holy<WG40> Spirit<WG4151> and<WG2532> of faith<WG4102>: and<WG2532> many<WG2425> people<WG3793> were added<WG4369> to the Lord<WG2962>.
Then<WG1161> departed<WG1831> Barnabas<WG921> to<WG1519> Tarsus<WG5019>, to seek<WG327> Saul<WG4569>:

And<WG2532> when he had found<WG2147> him<WG846>, he brought<WG71> him<WG846> to<WG1519> Antioch<WG490>. And<WG1161> it came to pass<WG1096>, that a whole<WG3650> year<WG1763> they assembled<WG4863> themselves<WG846> with<WG1722> the church<WG1577>, and<WG2532> taught<WG1321> many<WG2425> people<WG3793>. And<WG5037> the disciples<WG3101> were called<WG5537> Christians<WG5546> first<WG4412> in<WG1722> Antioch<WG490>.
And<WG1161> in<WG1722> those<WG3778> days<WG2250> came<WG2718> prophets<WG4396> from<WG575> Jerusalem<WG2414> to<WG1519> Antioch<WG490>.

And<WG1161> there stood up<WG450> one<WG1520> of<WG1537> them<WG846> named<WG3686> Agabus<WG13>, and signified<WG4591> by<WG1223> the Spirit<WG4151> that there should<WG3195> be<WG2071> great<WG3173> famine<WG3042> throughout<WG1909> all<WG3650> the world<WG3625>: which<WG3748><WG99999> came to pass<WG1096> in<WG1909> the days of Claudius<WG2804> Cæsar<WG2541>.

Then<WG1161> the disciples<WG3101>, every<WG1538> man<WG5100> according to<WG2531> his<WG846> ability<WG2141>, determined<WG3724> to send<WG3992> relief<WG1248> to<WG1519> the brothers<WG80> which<WG3588> lived<WG2730> in<WG1722> Judæa<WG2449>:
Which<WG3739> also<WG2532> they did<WG4160>, and sent it<WG649> to<WG4314> the elders<WG4245> by<WG1223> the hands<WG5495> of Barnabas<WG921> and<WG2532> Saul<WG4569>.
